title: Is there no way to enter chat rooms with the new client?
body: I'm not seeing any option. The chat button at the bottom right just gives me access to chat to friends. Whatever happened to actual chat rooms and stuff?

replies.body: It's not currently available on the updated client, but I don't have any news on it coming.  The updated client is still in testing, so there's still a few things that have to make there way to it.  Share any feedback you have on the[ client discussions](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards to our client devs and testers!  Hope that helps!
